name: Teo Hat
description: A chunky hat with earflaps, a garter stitch band knit back and forth, and a pointy body knit in the round and finished with i-cord.
full_text: A chunky hat with earflaps, a garter stitch band knit back and forth, and a pointy body knit in the round and finished with i-cord. Measure head circumference (around forehead-ears-neck) to determine size. A 22” head is an adult size. Garter stitch in the band makes for a very elastic hat that will fit a child for years. 3/24/14: Now there is a step-by-step VIDEO TUTORIAL : Part 1 Part 2 Un gorro simple y calentito con orejeras y una banda en punto de musgo que se tejen con agujas rectas y el cuerpo hecho en círculo y terminado con cordón (i-cord).
